channel.title: Addding items or changing names
channel.description: HOw do i add items or change the names nice from god sword to devil sword and is there a app i can download that does that. btw i change the name on item.cfg but it doesnt work ANd I DO compile

item.title: Addding items or changing names
item.dc:creator: @Xile_Maizez Xile Maizez
item.description:
@Xile_Maizez wrote:

Its class8.java by the way.

Read full topic

item.title: Addding items or changing names
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

absolutely right, although you can do it (PArtly) server-side. When you change the names in the Item Config file, it changes the name which appears on a trade screen.

To change the actual name when equipping, or right clicking etc, im afraid you will need to be using a custom client, so you can edit it in the client files.

Read full topic

item.title: Addding items or changing names
item.dc:creator: @season_scape season_scape
item.description:
@season_scape wrote:

thats becasue theres 2 parts to serve devlopment Server side, and client side you will need to change the name in the client your using by going to class9.java or class8.java cant remember which you will have to change in both sides not one.

Read full topic
